item.title: Factory and builder patterns in JavaScript using object mapping
item.description: Overview Every language has design patterns, which help us to organize our code in a way, where itâ€™s easy to understand, maintain and test. JavaScript being one of the most commonly used dynamic languages, is also one of the most abused and misunderstood ;). In this post I want to share some examples of how code is written and how can it be improved to make it more flexible which is easy to maintain and follow.
